name: Chezz: Play Fast Chess
description:
Play fast chess in an all-new way!
Chezz breaks the rules to create the fastest, most frantic new way to play the classic board game.
Challenge yourself in a game that lets you move all the pieces at the same time. Fight quick online PVP battles in real time with other players, or solve hundreds of levels in adventure mode. Pieces change on each game board and can be upgraded. Fast like checkers, intense like chess. Play the ultimate board to action game conversion. Become the ultimate king or queen and join the Chezz revolution today!
Chezz Features:
Chess Tactics meet Action Gameplay
Queens, Kings, and all pieces move at the same time
 Upgrade your army for faster movement
Checkers speed with chess moves! Matches can end in 30 seconds or less!
 Board game strategy with unique twists across hundreds of levels
King Yourself in Single Player Adventure Mode
Can you beat every level to be king or queen of the city?
 Upgrade queens, knights, and your entire army to increase speed and movement
Customize pieces with unique skins and colors
 Unlock achievements & rewards
Challenge other players
Real Time online multiplayer
 Fast PVP combat with both players moving pieces simultaneously
Chess becomes a frantic, 1-on-1 army battle
New Challenges and New ways to play
 Traps to avoid on the battlefield
King protect and other new game modes
 Board setup changes with every level
